io.elegie.luchess.app.lucene4x.index.manager

Class IndexManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.elegie.luchess.app.lucene4x.index.manager.IndexManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FSIndexManager, RAMIndexManager

    public abstract class IndexManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods to manage the index. Subclasses should provide their own implementations of the underlying Directory of the index.

      • IndexManager

        public IndexManager(int analysisDepth,
            boolean openModeCreate)
        Parameters:
        analysisDepth - The opening moves depth.
        openModeCreate - Whether the index should be open in CREATE mode (i.e. erasing all previous games, adding all games in a go).
